tasks.title: Demo Video Production & User Onboarding Assets
tasks.description: Create demo video, user onboarding materials, and initial agent templates for tomorrow's AIOS v2 launch

context.goal: Create compelling demo content and smooth onboarding experience

deliverables: ✅ Demo video production guide with detailed script and technical specs
✅ Interactive product tour component with step-by-step onboarding
✅ 10 initial agent templates for marketplace launch
✅ Visual quick-start guide with interactive elements
✅ Email welcome sequence (5 templates) for user nurturing
✅ Product Hunt launch kit with complete strategy and assets
✅ Social media announcement templates for all platforms
✅ Help center structure and launch day materials
✅ User feedback integration and milestone celebrations

completion_summary.launch_readiness: Complete demo and onboarding system ready

tasks.signals_when_done: Demo video production guide complete, onboarding flow smooth, 10 initial agents ready, Product Hunt kit prepared
tasks.autonomy_level: MAXIMUM - Created compelling user experience with focus on wow moments
tasks.special_instructions: Focused on 'wow' moments in demo and smooth onboarding to reduce support load
tasks.process_reminder: Status updated to ready_for_review upon completion

history.summary: AIOS v2 User Documentation & Onboarding Experience completed with full user adoption system
history.completion_message: User documentation and onboarding completed with interactive onboarding flow, comprehensive help system, tutorial system, contextual tooltips, FAQ system, feedback system, accessibility features, and user preferences. Ready for seamless user adoption of AIOS v2 MVP.

Successfully completed comprehensive repository cleanup with 28 files archived, 3 phase directories moved, 35+ empty directories cleaned, and 4 new documentation categories created. Repository is now production-ready with clean structure and complete traceability.

history.summary: Production Launch Assets - Landing Page & Marketing Materials completed with full conversion optimization
history.completion_message: Complete landing page with 7 React components, demo video script, and comprehensive social media marketing assets created. Production-ready for AIOS v2 launch with conversion-optimized user acquisition funnel.

history.completion_message: Complete demo video production guide, interactive onboarding system, 10 agent templates, email sequence, and Product Hunt launch kit created. Ready for successful AIOS v2 launch with smooth user experience and maximum acquisition potential.
